data.name: Johnny Chainsaw
data.detailed_description:
Johnny Chainsaw is a narrative-driven puzzle platformer where players don’t have a jump button. Immerse yourself in this world of power structures, ethical dilemmas, and struggles in responding to change. Unravel the devastating secret that will destroy the world. Make your choice and decide the fate of the entire world.

Decide the Fate of the World


A discovery at the center of the planet, a response hampered by power struggles, and the inevitable change that threatens the world. You decide what happens to the people of Corut and how their lives be forever changed.

Unique and Simplified Controls

Johnny Chainsaw is a single player platformer that does not have a jump button. The player will navigate obstacles and levels without traditionally jumping. Controls have been simplified to only:
  • Joystick / Arrow Keys
  • A Button / Spacebar
  • Start Button / Esc
